name: Healing The Mind
description:
During a spiritual journey in the life of a human being, solve puzzles to achieve your ends.

You will embody a spirit that wishes to awaken our main character from his ethylic coma. For that you will have to solve puzzles concentrated around his soul mate. Each room is linked to a memory of their history. Therefore it's necessary, through the thread of the life of this character, and through various indices, to reconstruct the missing memories.

 The metaphor of coma, that we stage as metanoia, is in order to make the character realize that his forgetfulness was the problem and that it is by changing that he can get out of this state of coma.
